game.name: The Wolf Among Us
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking Dead, comes a thriller based on the award-winning Fables comic books. As Bigby Wolf you will discover that a brutal, bloody murder is just a taste of things to come in a game series where your every decision can have enormous consequences.
